verses.verse: All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> by their <S%H4550>journeys,<s%> according to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H7508>Rephidim;<s%> but there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7378>quarreled<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> us <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7378>them,<s%> "Why do you quarrel with <S%H5254>me?<s%> Why do you test <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"

The <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6770>thirsty<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5971>there;<s%> and the people <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why have you <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H1121>us,<s%> our children, and our <S%H4735>livestock<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst?<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> with these <S%H5971>people?<s%> They are <S%H4592>almost<s%> ready to stone <S%H5619>me.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Walk <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3947>you,<s%> and take the <S%H4294>rod<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with which you <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> and <S%H1980>go.<s%>

<S%H5975>Behold,<s%> I will stand <S%H6440>before<s%> you there on the <S%H6697>rock<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%> You shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> will <S%H3318>come<s%> out of <S%H5971>it,<s%> that the people may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>" <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> because the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7379>quarreled,<s%> and because they <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3426>"Is<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> among <S%H7130>us,<s%> or not?"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H977>"Choose<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> for <S%H977>us,<s%> and go out, <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek.<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H5324>stand<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4294>rod<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3898>him,<s%> and fought with <S%H6002>Amalek;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill.<s%>

It <S%H4872>happened,<s%> when Moses held <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed;<s%> and when he let <S%H5117>down<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed.<s%>

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H3515>heavy;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it under <S%H3427>him,<s%> and he sat on <S%H175>it.<s%> Aaron and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> held <S%H8551>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> the one on the one <S%H259>side,<s%> and the other on the other <S%H259>side.<s%> His <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H530>steady<s%> <S%H935>until<s%> <S%H8121>sunset.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2522>defeated<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>"Write<s%> this for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and <S%H7760>rehearse<s%> it in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> that I will <S%H4229>utterly<s%> blot <S%H4229>out<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from under the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3050>"Yah<s%> has <S%H3027>sworn:<s%> <S%H3050><s%> 'Yahweh will have <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>'"
